p:
7. Jomar F. Rabajante, et al
64
A detailed review about an early model‐based estimation strategy of COVID‐19 is presented in this study along with some useful insights from these models.
Also, a Susceptible‐Exposed‐Infected (SEI) model framework was presented, and auxiliary strategies were described to prevent the COVID‐19 outbreak. The study showed that exposure time plays a significant role in spreading the disease.
